job_details.job description: Customer Support Trainee (Voice). 12-month role handling customer queries (voice) for a telecom client. Troubleshoot service issues.
job_details.required qualification: B.A. or B.Sc (any discipline,  non-premier). Good communication skills. Must meet PMIS eligibility.

job_details.job description: Branch Operations Trainee. 12-month customer-facing role. Handle queries,  assist with deposits/withdrawals,  and explain banking products.
job_details.required qualification: Class 12 Pass or B.A. (any discipline). Good communication skills. Must meet PMIS eligibility.

job_details.job description: Stock Management Trainee (Warehouse). 12-month role in a grocery fulfillment center. Learn inventory receiving,  storage,  and dispatch operations. Use handheld scanners.
job_details.required qualification: Class 12 Pass or B.A. (any discipline). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: Refinery Maintenance Trainee (Instrumentation). 12-month hands-on role. Assist technicians in calibrating,  testing,  and maintaining process control instruments.
job_details.required qualification: Diploma in Instrumentation/Electronics Engineering (EIE/ECE). Must meet PMIS age and income criteria.
